column5: Just wondering if anyones been fishing on the Red River for walleye, North of Winnepeg. Was up the beginning of July catfishing. Did great on cats, but no walleye. Let me know when they start biting. I will be back.Thanx, Fur
the walleye do not stay in the river for the summer. they come back in from the lake starting beginning of sept. I would not come back until at least the full moon in sept.
